website_summaries.verdict: A supportive neck brace that some people find comfortable and others do not. If you have a shorter neck, it could be right for you.
pros: Can be used for daytime or nighttime wear
Therapeutic benefits for those with back and neck pain
Some describe the inner core as "squishy" and comfortable
cons: Some owners find the walls to be too short

customer_reviews.title: Kudos, Vive Cervival! Outstanding Neckbrace! Thank You!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product! Well Made, Washable, easy to Adjust ( I have a Small Neck so I was worried!).. I hold my stress in my Neck & Spine and I sleep in the Wrong Position! Yikes! Since, I have been wearing this Neckbrace at Night, (& around the house) I,have noticed A Significant Difference! I sleep better than ever and I am in less Pain! A Must Have!
customer_reviews.author: Rescue Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I got the thin brace 3". When I received the cervical collar is was labeled a small. The back tapers to a 2" and part of the back is the velcro only because the collar is too short--labeled a small. I am an orthopedic nurse, and if one needs a cervical collor, it must have support in the front and back of the neck. There is really nothing in the back to support the neck; however, I specifically need help with extension, so I turned the brace backwsrd, where the 3" width was in the back. Essentially this is a bad brace.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: It works great to relieve my neck pain
customer_reviews.text: The neck brace for Vive is a great relieve to me. After two epidural injections and a decompression surgery, my symptoms of arm pain caused by cervical nerve pinch do not go away. With much doubt I accepted a friend's suggestion to give this product a try, but it turned out working very well. It is firm enough to provide solid support while soft enough to make me feel comfortable. I wear it every day, at home and in office. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Wood

customer_reviews.title: This is worth looking at
customer_reviews.text: The neck brace is for my wife. She has chronic neck pain that requires her to have neck support which gives her neck muscles time to heal and relax. It works perfectly and the brace arrived on time, is built to be soft yet firm and she loves it. Perfect product for us. Thanks a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bob

customer_reviews.title: Wish I purchased this months ago.
customer_reviews.text: Even after only a week of use, I'm already feeling positive results. Very comfortable to sleep with (if not set too tightly) and my movement in sleep -in my opinion- was causing much of my discomfort and possibly even causing further compression damage. Very happy with purchase and product.
customer_reviews.author: E. Trusty

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal here. If you seriously have a crotchety neck like I do (already have had 2 spine-neck surgeries) this will support your neck and head and restrict movement. It is quite sturdy and stiff, not as comfy as less stiff braces but I whip this one out when I'm in serious pain or need some serious support. It is very stiff at first but loosens up a little bit and becomes more comfy very quickly so if you try it out and think it's too much give it a little chance to work it out. for me it only took an hour or so then it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J. McCane

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I have had some neck issues and it has been hard to sleep. I purchased this in hopes that it would give me some neck support. I am glad to say that it works well. It is soft and has an adjustable Velcro strap in the back. I took away one star because the Velcro strap is thin and cuts into my neck. I just cover it with a wash cloth and problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Gadetking

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fit & Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I like this neck brace. Flexible yet sturdy. Made well and seems to be a good fit for me. Material is comfortable for extended wear. No color transfers. Did arrive on time and well packaged. Item measurements are as described.
customer_reviews.author: TruthBTold

customer_reviews.title: Eliminated my should & arm pain...Gone....
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from neck and shoulder pain as the result of arthritis in my neck. My shoulder and arm becomes very sore when seated at my computer or driving. Before using this neck brace I was unable to sit / drive for more than an hour before the pain became unbearable. By wearing the neck brace I can sit or drive for hours with no pain. This device has eliminated the pain and allowed me to return my normal routine. This is my experience...other results may differ...but it worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: BAR500

customer_reviews.title: Great for general back pain
customer_reviews.text: I always have terrible back and neck pains. This brace helps to just rest the neck and prevent from further injury. After I wear it for a couple of days for at least an hour or two in the evening, the pain usually subsides. I recommend for injury and just general neck and back pain. Also quality made item. Great packaging and price.
customer_reviews.author: jz6283

customer_reviews.title: poorly constructed and  uneven
customer_reviews.text: I've had to wear cervical collars for the past 30+ years due disk problems resulting from a car accident. This is the worst collar I've ever owned. The collars I've owned had an even bilateral slope in the front. This one has one side with the traditional slope, but the other side is is not only higher, it comes to two points that stick up from the top of the collar. Do not waste your money with this vendor. The uneven sloping can actually worsen a neck problem.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Love this neck brace
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 herniated disks in my neck and they give me problems every once in awhile with the pain going down my neck across my shoulder and down my arm. Well I started having problems 2 weeks ago and nothing was helping. I tried the various exercises I learned in physical therapy but they didn't really help. So I looked for a good neck brace and settled on this one. After the first day wearing it my neck started feeling better. After a few days I could sleep at night without waking up frequently because I couldn't find a comfortable position. This is truly a GREAT neck brace!!
customer_reviews.author: Karin Adamson

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like is that I have to adjust it as tight ...
customer_reviews.text: This neck brace has been a life-saver for me. I struggle a lot with tension headaches, and this holds my neck in place and takes the strain off of my muscles. I even sleep in it sometimes and I wake up pain-free. The only thing I don't like is that I have to adjust it as tight as it goes for it to fit me properly. I am an average/small woman. If you are on the smaller side it might be a little too lose for you.
customer_reviews.author: kmartinez

customer_reviews.title: neck arthritis pain reliever
customer_reviews.text: i'm so glad that i found this neck brace on amazon! i had tried other neck brace and travel pillows before, but none of them worked like it, it relieves my arthritis pain and helped me sleep a little bit better in the right neck resting position. i suffer severe arthritis disease and the pain immobilizes me now 50, i exercised too much incorrectly in my younger years and now as a result, i can't work and physical muscle strength no longer usable. i highly recommend this neck brace for daily wear to keep your neck health other than wearing neck ties and neck scarfs. Thanks Amazon for providing a lot of life savor devices!!
customer_reviews.author: beach hanger

customer_reviews.title: Helps greatly with CPAP nasal mask
customer_reviews.text: I had to find a replacement for the chin straps which weren't working with my nasal mask. With the single simple straps, they would fly off and with the more complicated chin straps, my mask would come off. Then, I tried this and my mouth would finally stay shut (couldn't use full face mask due to headgear causing headaches from being too tight). It also holds my throat straighter at night which appears to be significantly lowering my AHI, too. (now, it's around or less than 1 instead of ranging around 4 to 5).
customer_reviews.author: B W

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product for me. I chocked badly. Be careful  :-(
customer_reviews.text: This neck brace choked me. Amazon told me they would not sell it again. Pain to return. I would not even give this one star.... I consider this a dangerous product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Neck support for sleep
customer_reviews.text: I like that this brace is comfy enough for me to wear to bed and take off quick if needed. I tend to scrunch my head-neck-shoulder area when sleeping which results in tightness, stiffness and extra trips to the chiropractor. Towels and pillows just frustrated me by getting too uncomfortable, too hot, or ill placed. This brace helps alleviate my "scrunch" and keeps my muscles elongated and relaxed! So glad I found this helpful solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for stiff neck
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this neck brace because my neck felt uncomfortable from too much time spent with my head down, typing or reading on my iPad or books. My sitting posture isn’t the best either when I’m relaxing, and this contributes to next pain or stiffness. I had the “Velcro” sound often when I turned my head or bent it too the side. This helps with that. I ordered it in the 4 inch height and may order a 3 inch one. This fits my 6’ husband’s neck a little better than mine. I’m 5’5”. Once I get it on and adjusted, it keeps my head in place and aligned with my spine.
customer_reviews.author: PT Cruiser

customer_reviews.title: Vive Neck Brace Cured 80 year old Mothers Headaches she has for Months Awesome Brace
customer_reviews.text: “Love this neck collar. So very soft and just what my elderly Mother needed. Bought this for her as she was having horrible headaches from some disks in her neck. It was just as described and this did the trick She is a very petite woman weighing 94lbs at 80 years young. The pain specialist and injections didn't help. But the collar helps and know more headaches. : ) She suffered for months.”
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: Great support great color
customer_reviews.text: At first it was so stiff that I was concerned. It loosened to a more comfortable support quickly. Also fits my neck well. I have had problems with that on my old one. I love that it isn't white. On a white one, makeup rubs off on to it and it stains fast. The black won't stain so easily. At least you won't see it. Also I think that it is less noticeable to the public.
customer_reviews.author: Btagent2

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for a neck pillow to support my weak neck during sleep, didn’t think about a neck brace. Bought this to keep my neck still for a few days after I injured my neck, but this brace also works well for night time supporting purpose without being uncomfortable (I use the thin one for sleeping and bought the standard one for day use, as my neck is in the middle of those sizes). I’m now being able to sleep through the whole night with my neck supported. It also prevents me from turning my neck to the side all night (a bad habit that gave me pain the next day).
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: Re-ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.text: After many drug store white ones I ordered the Vive neck brace. Really like the height ( bought the shorter version.) Supports my neck with firm control and keeps it warm. Also like the extra cloth sleeve that fits around the front. The white ones wear out because of bread friction. Sleeve can be easily washed and fitted back on. Wear a brace allot when I'm home. Bought a second brace to rotate wearings. My brother complained with the same neck conditions so I ordered one for him. Also like the length, fits around my 16" neck with an inch to spare.
customer_reviews.author: neil curran

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this neck wrap. It’s exactly what I needed for my cervical spinal stenosis and arthritis in my neck. I can put this on as loose or tight as I want and keep doing what I’m doing. A great multi tasker. Before I purchased I didn’t ice my neck like I should because I didn’t take time to lay down and I could only do one side at a time. This was a great purchase and add to my treatment and preventative practices
customer_reviews.author: FLBeachmom

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable and large, but nice color.
customer_reviews.text: I have a neck injury and I have to wear a neck brace in order to get my daily activities conformatbly, I already own one but I did not like the color so when I saw this one I thought it would be great, but sadly is very uncomfortable and it runs large, I ordered the small one, and is still very long for my neck, I would be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany

customer_reviews.title: You may want 2 so you can wash one while using the other
customer_reviews.text: I have thew 4 inch version it is contoured to better fit under your chin. it was not perfectly symmetrical shaped with it self..but close enough as it is a little stiff at first but it did conform to me and became more comfortable within a few hours it has a removable washable sleeve.. it would be better if it had 2 sleeves to swap for washing. If you sweat too much during sleep you'll need to wash the whole thing more often so 2 of them is better if you can't do ok without it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Igneous

customer_reviews.title: Product as described but didn't work for me, BUT most likely would for someone else.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me but my cervical neck was curved backwards & to the left at a 60 degree angle. I just had my 2nd major neck operation...replacing & respacing 5 disc levels (first operation was to have a titanium scaffold inserted around my entire cervical spine to correctly align it over a 4 yr period...kind of like teeth braces - which I also had on for 4 yrs - but this intricate cage was around the entire cervical area of my spine). I was born with MAJOR malformations in that area so I'm a 'special' case.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna M

customer_reviews.title: just a quick note to let you know how happy I am with the cervical collar
customer_reviews.text: Hello, just a quick note to let you know how happy I am with the cervical collar! It is very well made, and fits my neck perfectly. I have had to wear a collar for many years now, I have had collars costing much more money, but none have ever fit me as well as this one. Vive has provided me with a very high quality and extremely supportive neck brace at a great price. I am very happy with it, and am recommending them to anyone that is in need of a strong, comfortable and well made cervical collar! Thank You! Lary
customer_reviews.author: Lary Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Which width.
customer_reviews.text: Ahh, my on complaint is the width it's too wide for the average woman. I find that I have to over extend my neck in order to put it on an take it off. Also.afer wearing for a.few.hoirs.my neck and chin are sore from being over extended. So they should offer different widths.
customer_reviews.author: urs131

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed a new neck brace when the one he was given 6 months ago after neck surgery began to lose its firmness. He liked the idea of a black one since he figured it wouldn't show dirty as bad. He's right, it doesn't. It also doesn't show lint like some people note, but maybe that's because he's not around anything that's producing a lot of lint. This is firm, although he sometimes says it's too firm, but I'm sure it'll loosen up a bit over time. It gets the job done and gives him something to wear when his neck gets too tired after a long day of walking.
customer_reviews.author: JLovesBooks

customer_reviews.title: Really helps with neck pain
customer_reviews.text: I had a muscle spazm in my neck and needed to keep it from moving. This did the job and offered me incredible relief from the pain. It did irritate my ear and my neck when I wrote for long stretches. Would maybe get the 3 inch if I need it again. One downsize is if your neck is hurting there is no way you can put this on yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Brilliant Product.
customer_reviews.text: I injured my neck and Ive spent hours looking at different Cervical Collars, this one is really good. I mostly wear it at night while sleeping, I've slept peacefully while wearing this brace and I've had no irritation from the fabric. I do love the Velcro Fastener. The Collar can be worn loose or tight, for reference purposes, my neck is 12 1/2" in circumference and this item adjusts and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SY214Top Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Description says 15-20. 5" neck. I am 18 ...
customer_reviews.text: Description says 15-20.5" neck. I am 18.5" and JUST barely fit. I can have the velcro slight attach and wear it but I would have prefer it to be more secured. The foam is dense and firm though you can still squeeze it if you wish. I bought it to help me keep my head up while on the plane. It did do what I wanted but with little room to secure the velcro, I don't see myself using it often.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality medical grade
customer_reviews.text: After having serious cervical spine surgery, in transitioning to a shorter neck brace from the head gear, I needed a strong collar to help hold my head in proper alignment. Most collars offered in retail pharmacy stores were too soft and did offer adequate support. This collar was perfect. Love that it has a removable, washable sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Move Slowly While Healing
customer_reviews.text: For myself, I had to slowly adjust the neck piece lower under the chin. Eventually, my neck was raised up from the dip that goes under the chin. That’s when I noticed the pain on one side of my neck was going away. After3 day, especially sleeping w it for 2 night & cont during the day it has improved. Also been using homedic hand held massage on the neck & shoulder blades. I ordered another one so when I steam clean the 1st one & don’t have to be troubled about getting one really sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Senior Person

customer_reviews.title: It was so bad, I was a step away from calling 911
customer_reviews.text: So I woke up and couldn't even move my head. It was so bad, I was a step away from calling 911. And I have a high tolerance for pain. It was a very painful night to sleep on, so I had this and the Ohuhu Neck Cervical Traction neck brace next day delivered. The combination of the two relieved my pain, and helped the healing process. This product was very firm, and kept my head in one position. This was comfortable enough to sleep with. But I didn't like to wear this for long periods during the day, since it was so constricting.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Hiker and ProspectorTop Contributor: Hiking

customer_reviews.title: Great neck support
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made item with adjustable velcro strap that fits my neck well and provides enough support without restricting head movement. Helps reduce neck muscle tension. Great neck support on long car drive or while working on computer.
customer_reviews.author: dochlee

customer_reviews.title: A very supportive neck brace
customer_reviews.text: I like that this neck brace come in a choice of short or longer neck height and is contoured and supportive. Wearing it in a car and walking I feel secure and supported, pressure on my spine is relieved and that I wont move around make my neck pain worse. I do not like, that it is feels hot around my neck, and it makes my neck sweat. The velcro closure gets my hair stuck in it.
customer_reviews.author: Iris M.

customer_reviews.title: Provides neck-shoulder pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Really helps with cervical radiculopathy pain in the neck-shoulder area. I wear it for a few hours when it feels sore - either during the day or at night while I sleep (it is comfortable while sleeping) and it definitely offers pain relief (5 stars) Would have been even better with a removable/washable cover but it says the collar is hand washable though I haven't washed it yet.
customer_reviews.author: SuniK

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is an issue
customer_reviews.text: The collar was too small and it's related to the fact that the website options don't offer different sizes from which to choose. There is only the 3" and 4". I chose the 3", believing that the collar must be a "one size fits most", that there would be a long adjustable velcro strap in the back. Unfortunately there was only a 1-2 inch velcro strap so nothing to adjust. I have a fairly thin neck and this was just too tight. I had to return it. I really like Vive products though, and will continue to order other products from them whenever I need.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable it’s to hard for elderly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother whom is not mobile and confined to her bed because she was complaining of constant neck pain. She tried it for 20 minutes and couldn’t no longer handle it. It’s to hard and uncomfortable so it is a waist of money wish we could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. I tried placing it on. However, the velcro barely attached to close. I couldn't continue wearing it longer than a minute, unless I had a death wish. It's too small for me. I'm very disappointed. It's very firm, but one size, does not fit all. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: well made neck collar at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this neck collar for my wife that has a neck fusion done. the one they gave her at the hospital to come home with was very flimsy and cheap. so I searched Amazon and came across this collar which is made a lot better. she used it everyday Til she got better and did not need it anymore. she loved it because of the support they gave her neck. thank you for a great. product and at a good price also
customer_reviews.author: juan mercado

customer_reviews.title: Good (not good)
customer_reviews.text: I liked it. Immobilized my neck after surgery. I thought it helped a lot. But, when i showed up at my neurosurgeon’s office, he sternly told me to never wear again. It is a ‘rubber crutch’ that actually weakens the neck muscles and prolongs recovery time. Had to go to physical therapy to strengthen the neck muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C

customer_reviews.title: Great.Does help
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made, heavy sturdy foam that has kept my neck straight and lifted enough that my nerves are not being pinched, keeping me from pain and numbness. My husband insisted I purchase another one for him also.
customer_reviews.author: isabel m. truque

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend's husband who has neck pain. He loves it, as it helps relieve pain - he wears it to sleep in, and finds it very comfortable. I received this item very quickly and in perfect condition! Would definitely buy from this seller again!!
customer_reviews.author: gbmaltese

customer_reviews.title: This neck brace works perfect for my husbands issue
customer_reviews.text: This neck brace works perfect for my husbands issue. What is great is the neck brace is adjustable as it can fit his neck which is quite broad ( he used to play football, so is a big guy) or can go around mine also. It is sturdy enough and yet comfortable with a better price than the neck braces that are sold in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and exactly what I ordered. I bought it to help a chronic (over two years) injury post car accident so it didn’t do what I wanted but I would definitely buy it for a new/acute condition as it was great quality, black so as not to show dirt and the correct firmness to support the soft tissues of the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Drrandy

customer_reviews.title: Stabilizers my neck
customer_reviews.text: I mainly got this I mainly got this to stabilize my neck when I’m riding in the car well I am waiting to get neck surgery. Since I have a short neck this collar is wonderful. It stabilizes my neck. The only drawback is that sometimes it turns a little when I turn my head. So then The front doesn’t have the dip for my chin in the middle. This could be user error I am not sure. Maybe I have it too tight or too loose. Other than that it’s a great collar.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Not as described & dirty
customer_reviews.text: The fabric on this feels like a canvas gym bag; rough and stiff. I also think this may have been used. It seemed it had makeup marks inside the collar. Definitely sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: T. F.

customer_reviews.title: BEST CERVICAL COLLAR YOU WILL EVER HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS CERVICAL COLLAR. IT KEEPS YOUR NECK IN PLACE AND THE WIDTH IS REALLY APPROPRIATE. IN THE PAST I HAVE HAD OTHER COLLARS THAT WERE 3" OR 4" AND THEY DO NOT FIT WELL. I AM EXPERIENCING SEVERE NECK PAIN CAUSED BY PINCHED NERVES. I WEAR THE COLLAR DURING THE DAY AND AT NIGHT AND IT IS COMFORTABLE AND KEEPS YOUR NECK IN PLACE. HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT. RON UNDERWOOD
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E. Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Great for sore neck from poor sleep and posture!
customer_reviews.text: I developed a sore neck that continued for almost a week. I was losing sleep at night, and taking Aleve like it was M&M's. After doing some research, I ordered this Vive Neck Brace. It arrived in less than 24 hours! I wore it that evening. I must admit that it was difficult to get used to at first, especially for sleeping. I also wore it during the day around the house. I noticed improvement after 2 days and after 4 days, I was pain free. I still wear it occasionally when I am spending a long time working at my desk. Ir reinforces better posture and, hopefully, will prevent a relapse.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Eelman

customer_reviews.title: Order the right size!
customer_reviews.text: This seemed very nice and just like the one I used 30 yrs ago. However , i have little neck left apparently, should have ordered the 2" one. These guys had a good one and were very quick to get it to me. Really tho if you order 1 , measure your neck. They have three widths available.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Iris

customer_reviews.title: Great for stability when needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for stability for when I am in a car for an appt or to go somewhere shortly. It provides a mental relief knowing you have something on your neck with this crazy driving world. I had my 3rd cervical fusion and doc would not give me a soft collar this time. Pffft luckily I bought my own! I do suggest measuring your neck before buying.
customer_reviews.author: S. Varney

customer_reviews.title: it really works!
customer_reviews.text: i really tweaked my neck. could not even move it or lay down to sleep without pain. next day delivery on this neck brace and that night i could sleep! it stabilized my neck very well. fairly comfortable to wear and for my problem, it worked! i bought the 3 inch and 4 inch and found the 4 inch to be best for me. the 4 inch held the neck tighter and more upright.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Wondell

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The collar is a good deal for the price. It has been helpful with maintaining neck posture. I don't know, however, if this would be the right product for more intense or severe neck issues. Since the foam inside is also fairly thick, it can be uncomfortable to use when the temperature is warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Leano

customer_reviews.title: Not the right size runs small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small supposed to be 3 inches it smaller than my 3 inch one from a medical supplies store wish I could really return it but used like a dummy I used it hoping it would work. So now i stuck with a worthless piece of foam. Should give it no stars just for having a wrong description.
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and unyielding. Really uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Too stiff and unyielding and quite uncomfortable. You don’t want something that is fighting your neck but supporting it. Also it is too thin, about half the thickness of the one I already have. Cheap. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Stopped sleeping neck pain, helped with snoring too.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to relieve neck pain from sleeping. It did that and also reduced snoring because it helped me to keep my mouth closed during sleep.
customer_reviews.author: EEI

customer_reviews.title: this is the most comfortable and supportive collar I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: I have worn cervical collars for thirty five years...this is the most comfortable and supportive collar I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: B J Salsbury

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I'll fitting too thick and short with no way to adjust. It was too small in circumference to fit my 100lb elderly grandmother. If it this "one size fits most" won't go around her neck, I can't understand who it would fit? Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deva R Woodly

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: If I’ve got a thumping headache that won’t go away for days, this product may help take it away. It forces you to keep your head in a position that takes spinal pressure off nerves, and that’s wonderful. Not much else can be accomplished in that position though. This can’t really be used while multitasking.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Moon

customer_reviews.title: Stretch that neck
customer_reviews.text: I had a wicked pinched nerve in my neck and bought this thinking it would help with the pressure which it did. Its made real well I dont know if Im using it for the right thing but my neck is better and I dont need to use it now
customer_reviews.author: joesant

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Have had a very long history of neck pain while trying several braces for relief only to be disappointed by the lack of progress. However the Vive neck brace has brought me comfort as it fits very well, very firm, and holds the neck in the right position for PC work or reading. Strongly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Peters64

customer_reviews.title: This is not for people who have narrow necks. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not for people who have narrow necks. :( Even though it adjusts in the back, its still to big. I was able to return with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey T

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable neck brace
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable under the chin compared to the one my Orthopedic Surgeon issued to me. I only bought this one because I thought having a black one would look more clean. Unfortunately I never was able to wear this one because it was so uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Melina L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: 3” works better and is less confining than the 4”
customer_reviews.text: By your photo this looks like the 4” collar. I found this too confining and stiff to wear on a daily basis. Sent for the 3” and it’s much better!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia D.

customer_reviews.title: very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Wearing this 4 inch brace while sleeping, prevents my harmful tendency of curling my neck forward while sleeping on my side. I'm able to sleep comfortably for at LEAST 5 or 6 hours. Then, however, in order to get back to sleep, it seems helpful to remove the brace. I tried the 3 inch brace, but it was extremely uncomfortable for sleeping on your side!
customer_reviews.author: MIKEMCD77

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the product itself seems fine.
customer_reviews.text: I have been having neck pain, so I decided to purchase this brace to see if it would help. I had to have my chin pointed up and forward to even put the brace in position. I am 5’2” 115lbs. Maybe a smaller version would help, but the 4” size did nothing for me - my neck felt more strained wearing the brace than when I did not have it on. The quality of the product itself seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Vive Neck Brace well-made, but a bit too narrow
customer_reviews.text: The Vive Health Neck Brave is well-made and sturdy and fits well. However, it doesn’t prop up my head as much as I had expected. The portion of the brace that the chin rests upon is just a bit too narrow and allows my head to slump. If another 3/4” to 1” were added to the neck brace I think it would be perfect. I still use the brace occasionally, but I really need better support for my head.
customer_reviews.author: herb schulsinger

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Enough to Sleep In
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brace for occasions when I have a stiff neck or have neck pain in general and need to get a good night of sleep. My neck is a little short for this brace but it works alright. When I first put it on I felt immediate relief from the pain of the stiff neck I had at the time and I was able to sleep in relative comfort. I wouldn't wear this every night, but on the occasion where my neck it bothering me it is a godsend. Just be aware that, as a brace, your range of motion will be limited.
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this neck brace for my granddaughter who pulled muscles in her neck and shoulder area which is very painful. She said this neck brace helped with her pain and stabilized her neck. She was very happy to get this. It was delivered a day and a half after I placed the order.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S

customer_reviews.title: A little too big
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'5" tall and 250 pounds. And this neckbrace is larger than the one I got from Apple . (Obviously not the computer company !). In short... It's too big even for me. I love all the Vive health products except this one. I don't know who they were using when they designed this thing. The model in the ad must be about 6'8". Or she is average size with a freakishly long neck.
customer_reviews.author: DR DEADPOOL

customer_reviews.title: Great for neck support!
customer_reviews.text: I have massive issues with my neck and back so this collar fits the bill! I wear this probably 8 hours a day. I usually wear it to bed. Ifin you’re looking for a stable neck support look no further! It’s really helped me with my issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: too tall and too hard
customer_reviews.text: The collar is not flexible and hard. I believe the material inside is wrong. Also it is too tall and bothers my chin. Probably I will have to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Dmitrieva

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and compact
customer_reviews.text: Fixes my neck right up! Takes me a while to get comfy in it. The chin notch is a good idea but I can't seem to get it. Maybe my neck is too short? But I love how dense and compact it is. I don't feel like I'm drowning or wearing a cone.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: It's a one-size fits most brace. I've herniated C6-7, and this is perfect for wearing around the house, with exercising to help with shock absorption, and to rest in. I'm very pleased with it. It's comfortable and shaped nicely with excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive
customer_reviews.text: The individual category ratings are based on my experience while the overall rating is what I think it could be for others. I have several neck issues including spondylitis, herniated discs, and arthritis. The angle that this brace held my neck was too painful for me although I’m sure for others it would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: A not so comfortable neck brace.
customer_reviews.text: Did not find this to be comfortable for me. Too stiff and actually found it to be somewhat painful. Misplaced the one I bought from Amazon several years ago. It was softer, very comfortable yet helpful. Unfortunately, I could not find it or I would have ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: rosie g

customer_reviews.title: Not really a negative review
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Vive neck braces - I have four of them but........... I need the soft foam model - I have given them the model number three times - but they always send me stiff uncomfortable ones. WHY WONT THEY LISTEN.
customer_reviews.author: Non De Plume

customer_reviews.title: Helpfull
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Have broken neck years ago and nerve pain. This item helps prop up the neck disks
customer_reviews.author: david jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Does support you head and neck.
customer_reviews.text: For mr it is a little too thick. If I wear for a long time it messes with my jaw. Maybe I need a less tall one as well. I did buy the smaller one. It does give me relief tho, wish I could wear a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback I have found is that the foam material is more rigid than I would like. I am hoping it softens up some as time goes by. I have massaged it a number of times and it has softened a little but not much. I gave it four stars for durabilty and easiness to clean because I don't have enough experience with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C.

customer_reviews.title: Helps a lot with pain
customer_reviews.text: My neck pain went away pretty much that same day! It helps support my neck and keeps my head straight. Having degenerative disc disease, I had neck pain a lot. When I clean, do yard work or sleep, I use it and it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Mama O

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Help
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to stabilize my neck some - the product is alright and pretty comfortable, so it gets 3 stars, but it just isn't firm enough to really hold your neck in place like a professional brace would.
customer_reviews.author: Alyse

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! My dad was recently diagnosed with ALS and has lost the ability to hold his head up. This has made a life changing comfort for him with the pain hes been dealing with! It fits comfortably and has relieved a lot of his pain! This was honestly the PERFECT fit, we had tried several others and this one works AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Katelin R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Collar
customer_reviews.text: I have a herniated disk & have to wear a collar for six weeks after surgery. One collar isn’t enough since you have to hand wash dry. I couldn’t be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Hunter

customer_reviews.title: We bought this for a family member and the length ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a family member and the length was too short for his neck. Otherwise it might have been quite satisfactory. We are unable to assess this collar because it did not fit anyone in the house unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: A Bailor

customer_reviews.title: A great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This collar, by Vive, will be helpful on my next long distance motorcycle trip. Having tested it with a helmet, I know for sure that it will reduce neck strain and fatigue while I'm travelling. That's an important thing. Also, I wore it around the house for several hours and it seemed to help with some scoliosis issues in my neck. I like this product.
customer_reviews.author: WJY

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I wear this to bed every night. I have no problem sleeping with it. I can tell a difference in the morning. I am not as sore and stiff when I wear it at night. I am flying to South Africa and plan to wear it on the airplane. It will fold once and fit in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Jan J

customer_reviews.title: Great relieber of your back pain.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable back brace and definetly able to relieve some pressure forced into back of your back. Recommend it especially when you are in your computer (my face always gave forward when into some computer work). I have tried to sleep with the brace but I am keep taking off during the middle of night without being aware of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfortable height. For me.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Vive collar for myself to use to help the strain on my neck in different situations. I have Cervical Dystonia. The length I ordered is good. Except, for myself, I wish it was made in half sizes for height. I could use a 3 1/2 in height for it to be comfortable. The 4 in would have to be trimmed to fit for me to wear. The 3 in fit my daughter just fine, and she is happy with it. So I gave it to her. She said it fits better than the one she had which had been recommended by a physical therapist. The thickness of the material is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsinite

customer_reviews.title: Large on me.
customer_reviews.text: This felt too large to give me the comfort support I needed. My head was propped up giving my neck support but wasn't as comfortable as I needed. My neck pain may be too severe for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S

customer_reviews.title: She Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister for her neck pain. She says it works well and she gets a lot of relief from her the pain in the neck. She would recommend this to anyone with unspecified neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Imelda

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight and Unrestrictive
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one ( I left the 1st brace on a plane) I have stage 3 degeneration in my neck, I wear this brace around the house doing household task and computer work. It is light weight yet supportive. I have a small neck and it fits great! Highly recommend it!"
customer_reviews.author: DolciAZ

customer_reviews.title: This works perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 3 inch brace because I have a short neck.. This works perfect for me. I get a lot of relief when my pinched nerve bothers me and gives me headaches seems they go away faster when I put the neck brace on.
customer_reviews.author: sharex

customer_reviews.title: This Neck brace by Vive is not comfortable but it did it's job to support and relieve ...
customer_reviews.text: This Neck brace by Vive is not comfortable but it did it's job to support and relieve the pressure off my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from spine issues in my neck and I own a few of these. I always sleep wearing one which helps the pressure and pain and allows me to go through the day without wearing one. I like this one because it's nice and firm, but also soft. My favorite thing about it is, you can remove the cover and wash. For people who are new to these, you kind of have to break them in by wearing them. This is a great one!
customer_reviews.author: IceGreenEyes

customer_reviews.title: Helped with pinch nerve
customer_reviews.text: I use this at night to sleep in to keep me from pinching a neck nerve. Using pillows just wasn’t working. I know it’s not made for that but it’s comfortable enough where I can sleep. It is such a relief not to wake up with numb, tingling fingers or a shock in the middle of the night because of my neck position.
customer_reviews.author: Lynster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have neck pain and stiffness when I wake up in the morning. I've tried various "neck" pillows but the best solution for me is to use a cervical collar to support my neck. I've tried several different ones and this one works the best. I have a long neck so the width (height) is perfect and so is the thickness. The velcro closure accomodates a lot of different neck sizes as well. I've just bought a 2nd one to use when I wash the first one. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Flatcoat

customer_reviews.title: Good, But Degrades
customer_reviews.text: I use this for stabilizing my neck while sleeping. After every couple weeks it needs to be washed, and after several months of gentle washing, it expanded/stretched somehow so that the velcro only barely touches when wearing it. But it's not too expensive, and was effective.
customer_reviews.author: Shambalagala

product_meta.title: Vive Neck Brace - Foam Cervical Collar - Vertebrae Whiplash Wrap Aligns and Stabilizes Spine - Adjustable Spinal Support Can Be Used While Sleeping and Relieves Pain, Pressure (Black)
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR PAIN RELIEF AND INJURY SUPPORT: This 4" thick cervical collar supports the jaw and neck while limiting mobility to relieve pain and pressure in the spine. Realigning and stabilizing vertebrae, the foam collar can be worn throughout the day and while sleeping for superior support and pain relief. The non-rigid neck brace will also relieve headaches caused by cervical strains and sprains. Useful for post-operative rehabilitation and injury support.

EASY TO PUT ON AND FITS MOST NECKS: Simply wrap the neck brace around the neck and secure with the integrated fastener. The integrated fastening strap allows the brace to be easily adjusted for a precise, personalized fit. The neck brace accommodates neck circumferences ranging from 15”-20.5”.
CONTOURED FOR COMFORT: Ergonomically designed, the plush foam cushions the jaw and neck for a comfortable, supportive fit. The foam is contoured to closely fit the chin and jaw for maximum comfort.

PREMIUM BREATHABLE MATERIALS: Latex-free foam is soft and flexible, perfect for use while sleeping. The foam is covered with a breathable knitted material that keeps the neck cool and dry by providing proper air circulation.
VIVE GUARANTEE: 60 day guarantee so you can purchase now with confidence.
